outdoorLightMode.label: Outdoor Light Mode
outdoorLightMode.hint: Determines how outdoor light is handled in this scene and set relevant settings accordingly. See module documentation for details.

outdoorLightStatus.label: Outdoor Light Status
outdoorLightStatus.hint: Controls the brightness of new outdoor light sources. When changed, it updates existing ones accordingly.

changeDefaultLightAttenuation.name: Change Default Light Attenuation
changeDefaultLightAttenuation.hint: If enabled, the default light attenuation for new light sources will be changed to the value specified below.

defaultLightAttenuationValue.name: Default Light Attenuation Value
defaultLightAttenuationValue.hint: The default light attenuation for new light sources if the setting above is enabled.
